<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - ListNBox

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Adds list of rows of strings.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''lnbAddArray''' [idc, [[[text,text],[value,..],[data,..]],[[text,text],[value,..],[data,..]],]]
</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [idc, [[[text,text],[value,..],[data,..]],[[text,text],[value,..],[data,..]],]]: [[Array]]
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]] or [[Control]]
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] - index

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[lnbAddArray]] [102,[[["#1"],[1],["#1"]]]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[lnbAddColumn]], [[lnbAddRow]], [[lnbClear]], [[lnbColor]], [[lnbCurSelRow]], [[lnbData]], [[lnbDeleteColumn]], [[lnbDeleteRow]], [[lnbGetColumnsPosition]], [[lnbPicture]], [[lnbSetColor]], [[lnbSetColumnsPos]], [[lnbSetCurSelRow]], [[lnbSetData]], [[lnbSetPicture]], [[lnbSetText]], [[lnbSetValue]], [[lnbSize]], [[lnbText]], [[lnbValue]]
</value></part></template>
